Html: Can anybody advise me how I can get the short title in my bibliography to appear in all but the first footnote where I reference the given work?

You can't. At least not automatically.

In-text / footnote citations have a very limited awareness of their surroundings. For example, they don't know if they have been used before in the text or not. Hence, it is not possible to automatically decide whether or not the short or long version should be shown.

Theoretically, you could make the selection manually. But even then you will have to abuse some flag to indicate which format you would require. It has been done before, but it will require a lot of work / programming.
